itinerary: Visit Viceregal Lodge and Mall Road. Trek to Jakhu Temple.
Day trip to Kufri and Himalayan Nature Park. Visit Christ Church.
Explore Shimla State Museum, The Ridge, and Lakkar Bazaar.
Morning: Arrive in North Goa. Visit Calangute Beach for sunbathing and water sports.
Afternoon: Explore Anjuna Beach and enjoy lunch at a beach shack.
Late Afternoon: Visit Chapora Fort for scenic views.
Evening: Explore Basilica of Bom Jesus in Old Goa. Option: Sunset at Divar Island.
